rules_text:
Fathom {7}{G}{U} [i](If you cast this by sacrificing a creature or Vehicle and paying the fathom cost reduced by that permanent's mana value, put this onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves or loses targets.)[/i]
Draw a card. Create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token.
Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token.
Sacrifice two Tentacles: Target Kraken you control gains hexproof until end of turn.
